alert.note: Alert for Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 14 at 9:54PM CDT until March 15 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog, mainly after midnight. * WHERE...Menominee, Northern Oconto County, Shawano, Southern Marinette County and Southern Oconto County Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Below freezing temperatures will result in icy spots on untreated roads. The fog will impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights, and keep a safe distance from the vehicle in front of you.

area.areaDesc: Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
